title: How the first letter was written
creator_credit: Lee Mishkin, Nick Bosustow and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Adapted from Rudyard Kipling’s “Just so stories” this animated film is a mythical story about the world’s first letter written by a cave girl humorously illustrating the advantages of written communication.
